name: TimeFixers Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Q9450 @ 2.6GHz - AMD Phenom II X6 @ 3.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 - AMD Radeon 7750 - Intel A310
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 4790 @4Ghz - AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @3.6Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1080ti - AMD Radeon Rx Vega 64 - Intel A750
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
